document.full_text: russia's population declined by nearly 3.4 million over the past decade, according to census figures released monday, adding to fears that an aging and decreasing population will sap economic growth.
document.title: europe: russia: new census shows population decline
lines_and_colors: russia's population declined by nearly 3.4 million over the past decade, according to census figures released monday, adding to fears that an aging and decreasing population will sap economic growth.
